text: Hi Is it possible to upload emails from a previous CRM into HubSpot? I had a look at the documentation and I was unclear as it seemed to indicate I couldn't create a new thread and would imagine these historic emails would be classed as new threads. Thanks in advance
I would try changing grant_type: "refresh_token" to grant_type: "token"
Hey everyone is there a good endpoint for gathering all contacts without a contacts id or email? Just to grab all contacts? Because the */crm/v3/objects/contacts* is just too slow for big data

Hi everyone! I'm trying to make a contact record in an event. Does anyone know what values are accepted in the 'subscriberState' field? I'm sending a string with only the word 'subscribed' and the documentation says a string value is allowed. Any ideas?
`{"status":"error","message":"Unknown state for 'subscribed'","correlationId":"4e4b270b-2df3-4fb5-b067-27fd37765e78"}`
what is your problem / question?
I have an app with a survey screen that is a touch screen for the first selection. see screenshot:
I have the survey as a form connected to HubSpot and all the properties are coming into HubSpot correctly except for the first selection for “I am a…”

I believe this is because those “I am a” options in the app survey are touch screen vs the other properties in the field have to be manually entered. I asked my developers to help fix issue and they recommended updating the JSON I made with the following and asked if I could test in Postman to see if those “I am a” properties carri
carried* into HubSpot just like the other ones did
what are the allowed options for that field?

*This video kind of shows what the current format is Forms | HubSpot - 7 July 2022* - <https://t.sidekickopen08.com/s3t/c/5/f18dQhb0S7kF8bWLvzW1ngmWp59hl3kW7_k2847sC-SQW1nBlNr2PyH9bV26vjs7Try04103?te=W3R5hFj4cm2zwW4mKLS-3ZZnS7W1JxwY51LDKpZW49Kpvl3yRsZZW21gw7j20WxK0W3LFcFP1S1sShW1Q6BGv3yQcx94pp9J1&si=7000000000063455&pi=a827713f-c34f-4ba8-e920-0e3fdc265223|Watch Video>
currently it is a multiple checkbox
I also added a single line text option but that did nothing
i gotta be honest, i’m not comfortable clicking that link.
you can upload short videos to slack directly

but you haven’t answered the question: what are the allowed options. The message in your screenshot says that `commercial_pro` isn’t an allowed option for that `I am a` field. I would look into how that custom property is set up and see what the allowed options are.
oh sorry! here is the video
I dont really know, my developer asked me to create a JSON which I have neve done before and I am not experienced in this at all so I was looking for any feedback from a pro

seems like your developer should create the JSON object. I’m not sure what you mean by a “pro”… i’m just a developer myself. I don’t think I could help out with this without being able to look at the form response that is being sent from the app to HubSpot in the request as well as the internal names of the properties in the `i_am_a` field to compare
Okay let me try to send those to you
when i said `form response` i actually meant the request body of the form that is being submitted to HubSpot
Okay thank you

Hello everyone. I'm adding subscribers to marketing events with email-upsert, everything looks fine, I don't get any errors, but when I make a POST request, it throws a 202 response and no error is shown. Any solution?

Has anyone figured out how to include product images from abandoned cart's in a HubSpot email? I tested using a Deal with a Contact and Product Line item that has an Image URL, but the image is the only item not showing up in the email. The Product Name, Price, Description, and link to Cart work, but no image. I'm stuck...
